summary:
Currently Environmental Commodity Trader at ACT Commodities.
BS in International Relations in ODTU-METU, Ankara.
MS in Risk Management, Internal Audit at the University of Athens
Born in 1995, currently 6 years of experience in fields:
-Trading Environmental Commodities in the Netherlands, 
-Investment Consulting for Residence Permit Programs in Greece,
-Warehouse Controls-Audits HSE(Health/Safety/Environment) in Romania, 
-Property Rental Agency for the US market
-Retail Sales, Online Sales/Customer Relations in Turkey, and Greece
-E-commerce shop owner on ETSY platform 

Former Basketball Referee in the official basketball federations of Turkey and Greece.

Advance commence in Greek/English,and native in Turkish, boosting his career in the Netherlands at ACT Commodities for 1.5 years now.

volunteer_experiences:
[{'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'role': 'Volunteer', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'İlkyar Vakfı', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQGRQ-apwyz8zA/company-logo_400_400/0/1579769271801?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=KNW7Gs1QpImlLW9OC8yd7je73mpKHmhDK88ITquz_58', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/ilkyar/'}, 'cause': 'EDUCATION', 'description': 'The organization is based under one of the most prestigious universities in Turkey (METU).
It believes in the children living in villages can also become future scientists, future academicians, future leaders, businessmen.

It aims to reduce all means of the educational differences and inequalities in Turkey by supporting the education of children living in villages psychologically, socially, financially...

Cooperating with the Ministry of Education, we visit the students in their schools, stay together and spend our time for some days in their villages and invite them to our universities in capital cities such as Ankara, Istanbul, Mersin and make them enjoy the social, experimental, and educational activities.

The organization provides educational funds for many students.
'}]
